## Description {#details}

A matcher/generator for finding suitable values for the next source in an operation&#39;s partially completed argument list.

Given that we&#39;re building some operation X and may have already filled some subset of its operands, this predicate determines if some value New is suitable for the next operand or generates a set of values that are suitable.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/opdescriptor-h">OpDescriptor.h</a>.
